entry.title: Skinny Love
entry.summary:
Author: p_peaches

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,457Chapters: 2/6Kudos: 6

Summary: As a prince and then a king, there have been certain expectations of Arthur. A king is expected to be a leader, to be experienced, both on the battlefield and in the bedroom. As Arthur has grown from a prince into a king, he has done what his knights, his soldiers, even the other nobles expect of him. But he has never truly enjoyed it.When Arthur lets it slip to Merlin that he doesn’t actually believe most sexual acts to be enjoyable, Merlin takes it upon himself to prove Arthur wrong. What follows for Arthur is the realisation that he is in fact attracted to men, sex in fact can be good and he does in fact have a submissive side.

entry.title: to protect a kingdom (is to protect you)
entry.summary:
Author: Katiebabyangel

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 79,313Chapters: 27/?Kudos: 329

Summary: Merlin isn't the first servant Arthur found a friend in. The daughter of one of his childhood nannies, Eira, has served as his maidservant her entire life. When Merlin is appointed as Arthur's permanent manservant, and the assignment goes well, Eira is reassigned - only no one asked for her to be reassigned. Eira's life spirals out of control, the new knights start to take advantage of their station, Merlin decides he needs to protect her, and Arthur is determined to figure out what's happened to leave a bad taste in his mouth without knowing Eira's been reassigned. Featuring good!Uther (as good as Uther can get), protective!Morgana, and Arthur's morally ambiguous attempts to keep both his servants alive and safe with guest appearances by various Knights of the Round Table! -Check notes for trigger warnings!

entry.title: A Legend that Begins With a Crush
entry.summary:
Author: Clearwater96

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,256,169Chapters: 81/?Kudos: 1,204

Summary: Arthur Pendragon and Merlin were literally from two different worlds. One is a prince from a great kingdom and the other a common farm boy from the next kingdom over. These two should have never met.But that was before they realized their parents were once friends and arranged the two of them to marry when they reached adulthood. That was before Uther turned on magic and Hunith went on the run with her infant son.Now, twenty years have passed and the Prince, Arthur Pendragon is far out of his depth. After four months of marriage and learning what he has about Merlin, he knows that things need to change, but doesn’t know what can be done.And with every attempt at trying going wrong, with mysterious boys showing up wanting to be a knight, strange physician’s trying to coerce his consort away, even stranger ladies who’ve seen to weaken Arthur’s brain, and the arrival of an odd Druid boy they need to risk it all just to get to safety…will Arthur ever get things to go right?

entry.title: carved my name wrong on that gravestone (you don't even know my date of birth)
entry.summary:
Author: deniigiq

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 48,618Chapters: 11/12Kudos: 165

Summary: “Arthur, listen to me,” Merlin says suddenly in a tone so gentle that Arthur forgets what he was about to say right then and there.“I’m—I’m listening,” he says.Merlin lifts his head from his nest of arms and passes a thumb over the scab forming in the very center of his lower lip.“I fucking hate you,” he says.(Arthur accidentally reveals Merlin's magic to the world, then accidentally bonds them together before he's king, thereby throwing their prophecy way off course. He tries to make it up to Merlin by making a place for him in Camelot, but that proves to be far more complicated than he can manage on his own. Meanwhile, Merlin finds a smartphone in a wishing well and tries to electrocute a paramedic.)

entry.title: It's Not About You
entry.summary:
Author: naxsanie

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 79,551Chapters: 16/?Kudos: 243

Summary: People were missing overnight, outlying villages that reside seaside were wiped out without any trace. And it seems to be a pattern that would lead right to the small town near the labyrinth of Gedref. The only part of Camelot that touches the great sea of Meredor.The Prince, along with The Round Table Knight– and Merlin– as ever, are ready to protect people from this malevolence magic. They have to find out the hard way that they’re powerless against it. It went so far, to them being amongst the missing people. Captured to a Magical Kingdom on an island across the sea where they’re worship a long told prophecy of someone name Emrys.

entry.title: King & Court
entry.summary:
Author: BeautifulFiction

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 119,366Chapters: 28/?Kudos: 1,304

Summary: Loneliness is an insidious thing. When Merlin looks at Arthur, he sees not just a prince waiting for his time to rule, but a young man struggling to find his place in the world, with little help from anyone else.The truth is, Arthur needs more than the friendship Merlin can offer. He needs people he can trust: men and women who will become his court and his confidants, and if he is going to survive to take the throne and lead Camelot into its golden age, he needs them sooner rather than later.Finding loopholes in Uther’s laws is no easy feat. Court life is a dangerous game, but it’s one Merlin has every intention of winning so that Arthur can have knights of his choosing by his side.And then there is the matter of his magic…

entry.title: Gave me a Key and Called it Home (Hogwarts is my home)
entry.summary:
Author: MalfunctioningMentallyUnstableBookworm

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 54,580Chapters: 7/66Kudos: 3

Summary: Harry Potter had never made friends at school. But when a boy showed up in his class in fourth grade on the second to last day of school, who hid his bruises the same as he did, Harry wanted a friend. Nathaniel Wesninski had run with his mother away from his father. He was placed in a school in Little Whinging while his mother figured out what they were gonna do. When they both get chosen to play on the Hogwarts Foxes, the all school quidditch team that competes with other schools the boys become friends. So naturally when shit goes down and Harry can protect them he does, which lands them in the 1940s.
